Motion3DFile
loopTime 60
isLoop 1
boneMotionDatas{ 3
	boneMotionData{ 4
		time 0 1 0.000000 0.000000 3.28000 30 3
		time 30 1 0.000000 0.000000 3.000000 30 3
		time 0 0 0.500000 0.000000 0.000000 30 3
		time 30 0 -0.500000 0.000000 0.000000 30 3
	}
	boneMotionData{ 2
		time 0 1 0.000000 2.500000 -2.000000 30 0
		time 0 0 0.000000 -1.000000 -5.000000 30 0
	}
	boneMotionData{ 2
		time 0 1 0.000000 -2.500000 2.000000 30 0
		time 0 0 0.000000 -1.000000 -5.000000 30 0
	}
}
END
